## Davide Gentile

Leading human factors research in nuclear operations at the university of toronto cognitive engineering lab

Previously consulted on ai risk at [armilla ai](https://www.armilla.ai/), researched human--ml interaction at the [schwartz reisman institute](https://srinstitute.utoronto.ca/), and interned at ericsson's [global ai accelerator](https://www.mitacs.ca/news/mitacs-partners-with-ericsson-to-provide-talent-for-global-artificial-intelligence-accelerator-gaia/). Member of [z-inspection](https://z-inspection.org/) since june 2025

Industries: nuclear, healthcare, transportation, industrial products, consumer products, software, web, mobile
